code: import{useState}from'react';import Loader from'../../../Loader/Loader';import masterController from'../../../../controllers/MASTER-controller';import userController from'../../../../controllers/USER-controller';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MasterEmailEnter=_ref=>{let{email,setEmail,codeConf,setCodeConf,code,setCode,sendCode,setSendCode}=_ref;const[showLoader,setShowLoader]=useState(false);const sendNewCode=async()=>{if(email!=""&&!(await masterController.checkMasterInBd(email))){setShowLoader(true);const b=await userController.getSendCode(email);setSendCode(b);setCodeConf(true);setShowLoader(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"phase-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"\u043F\u043E\u0447\u0442\u0430",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"text-input-field"}),codeConf?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"\u043A\u043E\u0434",onChange:e=>setCode(e.target.value),className:"text-input-field"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendNewCode,className:"send-code-button",children:"\u0432\u044B\u0441\u043B\u0430\u0442\u044C \u043A\u043E\u0434"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{showLoader:showLoader,setShowLoader:setShowLoader,text:"Высылаем код"})]});};export default MasterEmailEnter;
